TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumerationOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 為查詢和與列舉型別 (Enumeration) 相關的選項物件提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for query and enumeration-related options objects.

Public Sub New (context As ManagementNamedValueCollection, timeout As TimeSpan, blockSize As Integer, rewindable As Boolean, returnImmediatley As Boolean, useAmendedQualifiers As Boolean, ensureLocatable As Boolean, prototypeOnly As Boolean, directRead As Boolean, enumerateDeep As Boolean)

public: EnumerationOptions(System::Management::ManagementNamedValueCollection ^ context, TimeSpan timeout, int blockSize, bool rewindable, bool returnImmediatley, bool useAmendedQualifiers, bool ensureLocatable, bool prototypeOnly, bool directRead, bool enumerateDeep);

param.name: context
param.span: 選項內容物件，含有可以傳遞給提供者 (Provider) 的提供者特定的資訊。

span.span: The options context object containing provider-specific information that can be passed through to the provider.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 經由結果列舉的逾時值。

span.span: The time-out value for enumerating through the results.

param.name: blockSize
param.span: 一次要從 WMI 擷取的項目數。

span.span: The number of items to retrieve at one time from WMI.

param.name: rewindable
param.span: 表示顯示結果集為可回溯 (允許多重走訪)，否則為 。

span.span: to show that the result set is rewindable (allows multiple traversal); otherwise, .

param.name: returnImmediatley
param.span: 表示顯示作業應該立即傳回 (半同步)，或者先行封鎖直到所有結果都可用為止，否則為 。

span.span: to show that the operation should return immediately (semi-sync) or block until all results are available; otherwise, .

param.name: useAmendedQualifiers
param.span: ，表示顯示傳回物件應該包含修改過的 (地區設定感知) 限定詞 (Qualifier)，否則為 。

span.span: to show that the returned objects should contain amended (locale-aware) qualifiers; otherwise, .

param.name: ensureLocatable
param.span: 表示確定所有傳回物件都有有效的路徑，否則為 。

span.span: to ensure all returned objects have valid paths; otherwise, .

param.name: prototypeOnly
param.span: 若要傳回結果集的原型 (Prototype)，而不是實際的結果，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results; otherwise, .

param.name: directRead
param.span: 表示要擷取指定類別的物件或者要從衍生類別 (Derived Class) 擷取，否則為 。

span.span: to retrieve objects of only the specified class or from derived classes as well; otherwise, .

param.name: enumerateDeep
param.span: 表示使用子類別中的遞迴列舉型別，否則為 。

span.span: to use recursive enumeration in subclasses; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化要用於查詢或列舉型別之 類別的新執行個體，讓使用者為不同的選項指定數值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to be used for queries or enumerations, allowing the user to specify values for the different options.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BlockSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區塊操作的區塊大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size for block operations.

summary.span: 經由集合列舉時，WMI 會以指定大小的群組傳回結果。

span.span: When enumerating through a collection, WMI will return results in groups of the specified size.

value.span: 傳回區塊作業中區塊大小所用的 值。

span.span: Returns an value used for the block size in block operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值為 1。The default value is 1. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化變數建構函式，然後取得的 WMI 類別和子類別的所有執行個體。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DirectRead { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出指定的類別是否需要「直接存取」WMI 提供者，而不需顧及其超級類別或衍生類別。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class, without any regard to its super class or derived classes.

value.span: 傳回值，指出是否*直接存取*wmi 提供者所要求指定的類別。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果只指定類別的物件應該接收，而不考慮衍生或繼承。否則， `false`。`true` if only objects of the specified class should be received, without regard to derivation or inheritance; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化變數建構函式，然後取得的 WMI 類別和子類別的所有執行個體。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. [!code-csharp[wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead/cs/EnumerationOptions_DirectRead.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead/vb/EnumerationOptions_DirectRead.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnsureLocatable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出傳回的物件中是否應該含有可以找到的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to the objects returned should have locatable information in them.

summary.span: 這樣可以確保系統屬性 (例如 **__PATH**、**__RELPATH** 和 **__SERVER**) 不是 NULL。

span.span: This ensures that the system properties, such as **__PATH**, **__RELPATH**, and **__SERVER**, are non-NULL.

summary.span: 這個旗標只能用於查詢，在列舉型別中會被忽略。

span.span: This flag can only be used in queries, and is ignored in enumerations.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出傳回的物件中是否應該包含可以找到的資訊。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned should have locatable information in them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果 WMI 應該確定傳回的所有物件，都具有有效的路徑。否則， `false`。`true` if WMI should ensure all returned objects have valid paths; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnumerateDeep { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出遞迴列舉型別是否應該進入衍生自指定 Superclass 的所有類別中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass.

summary.span: 如果為 ，就只會傳回立即衍生的類別成員。

span.span: If , only immediate derived class members are returned.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出遞迴列舉型別是否應該進入衍生自指定 Superclass 的所有類別中。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果遞迴列舉要求到所有的類別衍生自指定的超級類別。，否則， `false`。`true` if recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化變數建構函式，然後取得的 WMI 類別和子類別的所有執行個體。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. [!code-csharp[wminet_EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep/cs/EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep/vb/EnumerationOptions_EnumerateDeep.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PrototypeOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出查詢是否應該傳回結果集的原型，而不是實際的結果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results.

summary.span: 這個旗標用於原型處理。

span.span: This flag is used for prototyping.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出查詢是否應該傳回結果集的原型，而不是實際的結果。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果查詢傳回的結果集而不是實際的結果; 原型否則， `false`。`true` if the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReturnImmediately { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出叫用的作業是否應該以同步或半同步的方式執行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion.

summary.span: 如果這個屬性設定為 ，則會叫用 (Invoke) 列舉型別，且呼叫會立即傳回。

span.span: If this property is set to , the enumeration is invoked and the call returns immediately.

summary.span: 結果的實際擷取發生於產生的集合移位時。

span.span: The actual retrieval of the results will occur when the resulting collection is walked.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出叫用的作業是否應該以同步或半同步的方式執行。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果應該執行叫用的作業，以同步或半同步的方式;否則， `false`。`true` if the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Rewindable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出集合是否假設為可回轉。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection is assumed to be rewindable.

summary.span: 如果為 ，集合中的物件會加以保留以便重複用於列舉型別中。

span.span: If , the objects in the collection will be kept available for multiple enumerations.

summary.span: 如果為 ，則集合只能被列舉一次。

span.span: If , the collection can only be enumerated one time.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出集合是否假設為可回溯。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the collection is assumed to be rewindable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果集合假設為可重新扭轉;否則， `false`。`true` if the collection is assumed to be rewindable; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAmendedQualifiers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出從 WMI 傳回的物件是否應該包含修改的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

summary.span: 一般來說，修改的資訊是附加至 WMI 物件的可當地語系化資訊，例如物件和屬性描述。

span.span: Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出從 WMI 傳回的物件是否應該包含修改的資訊。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 說明和其他修改的資訊不感興趣的如果將這個屬性值設定為`false`會更有效率。If descriptions and other amended information are not of interest, setting this property value to `false` is more efficient. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果物件傳回從 WMI 應該包含修改過的資訊。否則， `false`。`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
